[h1]Welcome to Kidney Island[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
📍 Want to [b]make maps?[/b] Join the [url=https://discord.gg/PWu3ZWa]Mapmaking Discord![/url] 📍
[hr][/hr]
🎮 Want to [b]play custom maps?[/b] Join the [url=https://discord.gg/WNfN5ky]Community Workshop Games Discord![/url] 🎮
[hr][/hr]
🏀 Want [b]top-tier Hoops action?[/b] Join the [url=https://discord.gg/vvtk8Rz]Ranked Hoops Discord![/url] 🏀
[hr][/hr]
Special shoutout to JC.Velli for instigating this project. $2500 was raised for the National Kidney Foundation in honor of Danny Oganovich and his ongoing battle with kidney disease.
